text:
A staff member at the Chennai City Police Commissioner’s Office fell prey to voice phishing.

Vijayalakshmi, a resident of Periamet, had an account in a nationalised bank. She got a call from an unknown person, claiming to be the bank manager, seeking her debit card details so it could be updated. She gave the details

The caller proceeded to purchase items worth Rs. 18,000 using her card.
title: Woman falls vitcim to phishing
